subject: Basketball
Coaches and Managers
World Cup (Basketball)
lead_paragraph: Juan Antonio Orenga was widely blamed for Spain’s failure in the FIBA World Cup, a tournament it hosted and in which it lost to France in the quarterfinals.
snippet: Juan Antonio Orenga was widely blamed for Spain’s failure in the FIBA World Cup, a tournament it hosted and in which it lost to France in the quarterfinals.
